unnormalised: Arre yaar, Adv. Sharma mhonta ki Sec. 138 Negotiable Instruments Actacho chotya dhandevaleank dukh dita, khas korun hea cheque bounce cases lagun! Hovuya te sodanch UPI vaprunk lagtle, barem na?
normalised: Arre yaar, Advocate Sharma mhonnta ki Negotiable Instruments Act-ache Section one thirty eight chotya vyaparank dukhdai aasa, khas korun he cheque bounce-achea cases-ank lagun! Kaim zaalem tor tannim atam soglleak U-P-I vaparcho zai, baraabar?
